bibl.title: J.D. THOMAS and R.S.O. TOMLIN, The Vindolanda Writing-Tablets (Tabulae Vindolandenses IV, Part 1). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: T. Vindol. IV, 1, 854-869. - First instalment of the approximately 37 ink writing-tablets from Vindolanda discovered in the excavation seasons of 2001, 2002 and 2003: Literary and sub-literary texts (854-856); - Military documents (857-860); - Accounts and lists (861-866); - Letters (867-869).
bibl.seg: BOWMAN A.K., J.D. THOMAS and R.S.O. TOMLIN, The Vindolanda Writing-Tablets (Tabulae Vindolandenses IV, Part 1). Avec résumé en anglais.
